title: Navigation primitives work on live page
description: Verify navigate, click, type, and scroll endpoints work against a real web page

steps.action: Start a session and navigate to a test page with forms and links (e.g., httpbin.org/forms/post)
steps.expected: Session active, initial screenshot shows the form page

steps.action: POST /session/click with { "selector": "input[name='custname']" } to focus the name field
steps.expected: Returns screenshot. The input field is focused (cursor visible or highlighted).
Returns screenshot showing 'Test User' typed into the name field. Text is NOT present in sidecar logs.
Returns screenshot showing the page has scrolled down (different viewport than before)
Returns screenshot of example.com (completely different page from the form)
Returns screenshot showing navigation to the linked page (or error if element not found)

steps.action: POST /session/type with no active session (after stopping)
